```{r data generation, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
while(T){
    a = sample(-10:10,1)
    b = sample(-10:10,1)
    if(a<0 || b<0){break}
}

c = a*b

a1 = paste0(a)
b1 = paste0(b)
if(a<0){
    a1 = paste0("(",a,")")
}
if(b<0){
    b1 = paste0("(",b,")")
}

mystr = paste0(a1,"\\cdot",b1)

```

Question
========

Evaluate:

$$`r mystr`$$


Solution
========

$$`r mystr`=`r c`$$
